Package net.sourceforge.jpcap.util

Provides utility classes used by the jpcap packages.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AnsiEscapeSequences String constants for color console output.
 

Class Summary
ArrayHelper Utility functions for populating and manipulating arrays.
AsciiHelper Functions for formatting and printing binary data as ascii.
FileUtility Writes data in tcpdump format
HexHelper Functions for formatting and printing binary data in hexadecimal.
PropertyHelper Property helper utility methods.
TcpdumpWriter Writes data in tcpdump format
Timeval POSIX.4 timeval for Java.
 

Package net.sourceforge.jpcap.util Description

Provides utility classes used by the jpcap packages.
